reviews.review_msg: EDUC 475 intersession, elementary math for PDP. Glad she's been consistent, she is still really funny and tells great stories. No exams thankfully, but 2 individual assignments and 6 group projects. Pretty hard marker. She's very bold, never afraid to tell u from right or wrong. Won't sugar coat anything. her 1st time teaching elem math

She is the rudest, most ignorant teacher I have ever known.  Unfortunately, she teaches Math For Teachers, which means that if you want to get into the PDP you'll probably have to encounter her at some point.  The class was a nightmare.
